LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Smartstore.Microsoft.Auth
LocaleResource.Value: Adds Microsoft authentication to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Microsoft authentication:

  • Create a new app at Microsoft.
  • Specify the URL listed below as the Redirect URI.
  • From the menu on the left side select Certificates & Secrets.
  • Click the New client secret button in the tab Client Secrets.
  • Enter the value of the key in the following form as a secret client key and enter the Application ID.
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.

LocaleResource.Value: Enter the value of your client secret here.
